author: stsp
msg: Teach the release.py move-to-dist command about moving artifacts from the
dev/ to the release/ folder on dist.apache.org.
(post_candidates): Use above constants instead of inlining the target URL.
(move_to_dist): Use svnmucc to move release artifacts from dev/ to release/.
